Text: Likhoradka (Russian: "Лихорадка", Serbian: "Милоснице" or "Milosnice") or tryasavitsa is a female spirit in Slavic mythology.
Triplets:<Likhoradka

--------------------
<Text: Likhoradka:  As a mythological figure, Likhoradka was related to the figure of Chuma, which in modern Russian is the term for plague.>
